<noinclude>{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:RMUpload
|Has author=WikiSysop
|part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section,
|rationale=This template displays and annotates the metadata of uploaded media.
|long description=__NOTITLE__
|Calls template=Template:RMMedia
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
|copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH
|year=2009
}}
</noinclude><includeonly>{{RMMedia

|Filename={{{Filename|}}}
|CopyrightBy={{{CopyrightBy|}}}
|CreationDate={{{CreationDate|}}}
|Uploader={{{Uploader|}}}
|UploadDate={{{UploadDate|}}}
|Description={{{Description|}}}
|Keywords={{{Keywords|}}}
|Format={{{Format|}}}
|RelatedArticles={{{RelatedArticles|}}}
|SubSectionOf={{{SubSectionOf|}}}
}}[[Category:Media]]</includeonly><noinclude>
</noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMList |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=This template lists all media which has been uploaded and attached to a particular article. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{RMList
|show=True}}
|Calls template=Template:RMListOuterTable |hints_for_templates_and_forms=To attach uploaded media to an article, the property }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 |hints_for_templates_and_forms=To attach uploaded media to an article, the property }}
{{#ifeq:{{{show|}}}|True|{{RMListOuterTable}}|}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMListInnerTable |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Builds the inner table |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} |- | align="center" |{{{1}}}{{RMCategoryLinkIcon|{{{1}}}}} |{{#rmew:{{{1}}}|{{RMNoNamespace|{{{2}}} }}|700|500}} |[[{{{3}}}]] |{{#formatdate:{{{4}}}|ISO 8601}}{{{4}}} | align="center" |[{{fullurl:{{{1}}}}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_info_icon_16x16.png][{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=formedit}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_edit_with_forms_icon_16x16.gif] | align="center" |[{{fullurl:{{{1}}}|action=delete}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_delete_icon_16x16.png]

<noinclude>{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:RMCategoryLinkIcon
|Has author=WikiSysop
|part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section,
|rationale=detects the right icon for the file
|long description=__NOTITLE__
}}
{{Copyright of article
|own work=True
|copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH
|year=2009
}}
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#switch:
  {{#sub:
    {{lc: {{{1}}} }} 
    | 0
    |{{#pos:{{lc: {{{1}}} }}|:}}  
  }}
  | image={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_image_icon_16x16.png
  | pdf={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_pdf_icon_16x16.png
  | document={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_document_icon_16x16.png
  | audio={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_music_icon_16x16.png
  | video={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_video_icon_16x16.png
  | vcard={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_vcard_icon_16x16.gif
  | icalendar={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_icalendar_icon_16x16.gif
  | default={{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_image_icon_16x16.png
}}</includeonly>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMListOuterTable |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Builds the outer table |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {| cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);empty-cells:show" |- ! style="padding: 7px 2px; background-color: rgb(17, 105, 136); color: white;" colspan="6" |Attached documents, images and media |- ! style="border-top: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);height:1px" colspan="6" | |} {| class="wikitable sortable" cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-collapse:collapse;" |- ! style="text-align: middle; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Category ! style="text-align: left; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Filename ! style="text-align: left; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Uploaded by ! style="text-align: left; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Creation date ! class="unsortable" style="text-align: middle; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Metainformation ! class="unsortable" style="text-align: middle; color: rgb(17, 105, 136);border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" |Delete |- {{#ask: [[Category:Media]][[HasRelatedArticle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] [[Image:+]]OR[[Document:+]]OR[[Pdf:+]]OR[[Video:+]]OR[[Audio:+]]OR[[ICalendar:+]]OR[[VCard:+]] | ?HasFilename | ?HasUploader | ?HasCreationDate | format=template | template=RMListInnerTable | link=none | limit=250 }} |} {| cellpadding="5" border="0" width="100%" style="background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);empty-cells:show" |- | colspan="2" | Manual refresh list: [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|action=purge}} {{SERVER}}/{{SCRIPTPATH}}/skins/common/images/icons/smw_plus_refresh_icon_16x16.gif] | style="text-align:right;vertical-align: top;" | {{#rmf: {{FULLPAGENAME}} }} |- ! style="border-top: 1px solid rgb(17, 105, 136);" colspan="6" | |}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:RMMedia |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=This template displays information of media (i.e. document, image, etc) in a box. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{RMMedia
|Media subcategory
|CopyrightBy
|CreationDate
|RelatedArticles
|Filename
|Description
|Keywords
|Format
|Uploader
|UploadDate
|SubSectionOf
}}
|Calls template= }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #aaa; background: #fff; float: right; clear: right; width: 30%" ! colspan="2" style="background: #996699; color: white" | ''{{{Media subcategory|}}} Metadata'' |- {{Tablerow|Label=Filename:|Value={{#if:{{{Filename|}}}|[[HasFilename::{{{Filename|}}}]]}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Copyright by:|Value={{#if:{{{CopyrightBy|}}}|[[HasCopyrightBy::{{{CopyrightBy|}}}]]}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Creation date:|Value={{#if:{{{CreationDate|}}}|[[HasCreationDate::{{{CreationDate|}}}]]}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Uploaded by:|Value={{#if:{{{Uploader|}}}|[[HasUploader::{{{Uploader|}}}]]}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Upload date:|Value={{#if:{{{UploadDate|}}}|[[HasUploadDate::{{{UploadDate|}}}]]}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Description:|Value={{#if:{{{Description|}}}|[[HasDescription::{{{Description|}}}]]}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Keyword(s):|Value={{#if:{{{Keywords|}}}|{{#arraymap:{{{Keywords|}}}|,|x|[[HasKeywords::x]]}}}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Format:|Value={{#if:{{{Format|}}}|[[HasFormat::{{{Format|}}}]]}} }} |- {{Tablerow|Label=Related article(s):|Value={{#if:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}|{{#arraymap:{{{RelatedArticles|}}}|,|x|[[HasRelatedArticle::x]] [[Related to::x| ]]}}}} }} |- {{#ifeq:{{lc:{{NAMESPACE}}}}|document|{{Tablerow|Label=Subsection of:|Value={{#if:{{{SubSectionOf|}}}|{{#arraymap:{{{SubSectionOf|}}}|,|x|[[subsection of::x]]}}}} }}}} |}

|<noinclude> {{documentation}} <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls. </noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Cite web in help |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section, |rationale=Displays a box in articles which fall under GFDL. |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Cite web in help
|wiki=
|url=
|title=
|retrieved=
|publisher=
}}
}} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }}
;References
The content of this page uses material from the article [{{{url}}} {{{title}}}] published by {{{publisher}}} (retrieved on {{{retrieved}}}).
This article is licensed under the [[GNU Free Documentation License|GNU Free Documentation License]].

;Copyright © {{{year}}} {{{copyright holder}}}.
Permission is granted to copy, distribute and/or modify this document under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License, Version 1.2 or any later version published by the Free Software Foundation; with no Invariant Sections, no Front-Cover Texts, and no Back-Cover Texts. A copy of the license is included in the article "[[GNU_Free_Documentation_License|GNU Free Documentation License]]". 
{{
GNU Free Documentation License
|year=
|copyright holder=
}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Header for wiki parts |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a nice header for all wiki parts, i.e. forms, templates etc |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Header for wiki parts
|Category=Form
|Icon=Image:Cog-green.png
|Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}}
|Thumbnail image={{{Form thumbnail|}}}
|Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}}
|author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||[[has author::{{{Has author|}}}]]}}
|Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||[[part of::{{{part of|}}}]]}}
|Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}}
|Has special namespace={{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|||[[Has special namespace::{{{Has special namespace|}}}]]}}
}}
|hints for templates and forms=The following values for category are allowed: Form, Template |Calls template=Template:Tablelongrow, Template:Tablerow, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#switch: {{{Category}}} |Template=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Template ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Short description|}}}|| {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=}} | {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Form=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Semantic form ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value=''main namespace''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value={{{Has special namespace|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value={{{Example article|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Category=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Category ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Content section=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Content section ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Property=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}

{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |User defined rule=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}

{{!}}}

{{!}}}

{{!}}}

'''Note –''' {{{1}}} 
{{Note|Note Text}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablelongrow |part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section |rationale=This is a helper template to display a table row spanning 2 columns. |parameters=
{{Tablelongrow
|Align=center|left|right
|Color=white|..
|Font size=100%
|Value=text to display
}}
}} | colspan="2" style="text-align: {{{Align|center}}}; background: {{{Color|white}}}"|
{{{Value}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablerow |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This is helper template to display a table row containing two columns. |parameters=
{{Tablerow
|Label=name of the label
|Value=text right to the label
}}
}} {{!}}style="vertical-align: top;" {{!}}{{{Label}}} {{!}} {{{Value|undefined}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Template |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to annotate any template in the wiki and to assign it to a content section in the wiki. |long description=__NOTITLE__Call this template whenever making a template accessible for other wiki users. It helps bookkeeping of the templates belonging to a particular wiki section. |Example article=Template:Person |parameters=
{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:Header for content
|part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section
|rationale=This generates the green bar at the top of each article in the Help-section.
|parameters=
|hints for templates and forms=The parameter "depth" must be included unchanged (as given in the example above).
}}
|Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Template |Icon=Image:Smw_plus_template_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Thumbnail image={{#ifeq:{{{Form thumbnail|}}}|||[[Form thumbnail::{{{Form thumbnail|}}}]]}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} |Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Sample template call === {{#ifeq:{{{parameters|}}}||''not specified...''|{{{parameters|}}} }} === Defines categories === This template uses these categories in category annotations: {{#ifeq:{{{defines category|}}}||* none|
    {{#arraymap:{{{defines category|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Defines category::x]]|}}
}} === Interaction with other templates and forms === This template calls other templates: {{#ifeq:{{{Calls template|}}}||* none|
    {{#arraymap:{{{Calls template|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Calls template::x]]|}}
}} This template is called by: {{#ask:[[Calls template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* none}} This template is populated by form(s): {{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|default=}}||* none ''(you can create a new form populating this template by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateEmbeddedForm?for+template={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}} create form])''|
    {{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|format=template|template=Show defining form|link=none}}
}} [[Category:Template]] [[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Template| ]] Edit the page to see the template text.

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Property |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Displays a property and some essential metadata. |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Property |Icon=Image:smw_plus_property_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === New pages (i.e. "redlinks") which are related via this property shall use the form: *{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} [[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Property| ]] [[Category:Property]]

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Category |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a category. |long description=__NOTITLE__ You should use this template to provide your wiki-community with a proper documentation of the categories used in the wiki. |Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Category |Icon=Image:Smw_plus_category_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === This category is populated by the form: {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Page has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}}|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} }}[[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Category| ]] === Defined in templates === This category is used for category annotations in the templates: {{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|default=}}||* none ''(you can create a new template using this category by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateTemplate?category={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}} create template])''|
    {{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|format=template|template=Show defining template|link=none}}
}} {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|[[Category:Wiki part| ]]|}}[[Is category::true| ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Subsection of |Has author=WikiSysop |part of=Teamwork section, |rationale=Allows attaching content to other content (e.g. projects, tasks, events and persons) in a hierarchical manner. |long description=__NOTITLE__ Denotes a content item as subsection of another content item. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[Is inverse of::Property:HasSubsection| ]] [[has domain and range::Category:Content; Category:Content| ]] [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[Category:Transitive properties]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Has author |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Specifies the author of a particular wiki section or a wiki article in general (i.e. content). |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[Has domain and range::; Category:Person| ]]
{{Category |rationale=Denotes videos |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |long description=__NOTITLE__ |Has default form=Form:RMVideo }} [[Category:Media]]
{{Category |rationale=Denotes vcards |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |long description=__NOTITLE__ |Has default form=Form:RMVCard }} [[Category:Media]]

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Template |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to annotate any template in the wiki and to assign it to a content section in the wiki. |long description=__NOTITLE__Call this template whenever making a template accessible for other wiki users. It helps bookkeeping of the templates belonging to a particular wiki section. |Example article=Template:Person |parameters=
{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:Header for content
|part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section
|rationale=This generates the green bar at the top of each article in the Help-section.
|parameters=
|hints for templates and forms=The parameter "depth" must be included unchanged (as given in the example above).
}}
|Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Template |Icon=Image:Smw_plus_template_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Thumbnail image={{#ifeq:{{{Form thumbnail|}}}|||[[Form thumbnail::{{{Form thumbnail|}}}]]}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} |Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Sample template call === {{#ifeq:{{{parameters|}}}||''not specified...''|{{{parameters|}}} }} === Defines categories === This template uses these categories in category annotations: {{#ifeq:{{{defines category|}}}||* none|
    {{#arraymap:{{{defines category|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Defines category::x]]|}}
}} === Interaction with other templates and forms === This template calls other templates: {{#ifeq:{{{Calls template|}}}||* none|
    {{#arraymap:{{{Calls template|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Calls template::x]]|}}
}} This template is called by: {{#ask:[[Calls template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* none}} This template is populated by form(s): {{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|default=}}||* none ''(you can create a new form populating this template by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateEmbeddedForm?for+template={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}} create form])''|
    {{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|format=template|template=Show defining form|link=none}}
}} [[Category:Template]] [[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Template| ]] Edit the page to see the template text.

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Get value from list |Has author=WikiSysop2 |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is useful if you have a list of values separated by an arbitrary delimiter (e.g. ",") and you need a value at a particular position in the list. |long description=__NOTITLE__ This template is useful if you have a list of values separated by an arbitrary delimiter (e.g. ",") and you need a value at a particular position in the list. |parameters=
{{Get value from list
|list=a,b,c,d
|deliminiter=,
|pos=3
}}
}} Test: {{Get value from list|list=Template:A template|delimiter=:|pos=2}} Test2: {{Get value from list|list=Template:A template|delimiter=:|pos=1}} test3: {{#titleparts:{{#arraymap:Template:A template|:|x|x|/}}|1|1 }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True }} {{#titleparts:{{#arraymap:{{{list}}}|{{{delimiter}}}|x|x|/}}|1|{{{pos}}} }}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Show defining form |Has author=WikiSysop2 |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True }}
